descriptionNullable:
We consider the arrivals and departures of the LEJ airport between 2019-07-18 and 2021-01-27 based on this [source](https://www.mdf-ag.com/en/passengers-and-visitors/leipzig-halle-airport/flights/arrivals-departures/). There are two datasets:
* data_depa for the depatures
* data_arri for the arrivals

The features are:

| Feature  |    Meaning    |
|----------|:-------------|
| flight | flight number  |
| dest |    destination   |
| plan | timestamp for planed arrival/departure |
| expect| timestamp for expected arrival/departure |
| status| status of the arrival/departure|
|airline| name of the airline based on the iata code of the flight number|
|date| date of arrival/departure|
|dist_km| distance of the destination to LEJ in km|
|dist_mile|distance of the destination to LEJ in mile|
|gate|departure gate (only in the data_depa dataset)|
|dest_lat|latitude of destination|
|dest_long|longitude of destination|
title: Airport_Leipzig-Halle (LEJ)
description:
